channel.title: Weigh Station on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Weigh Station on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-12 East Approaching US-730
item.description: US-12 East approaching US-730. All trucks use US-730 west, to access the Weigh Station.

item.title: US-54 North - New Mexico Weigh Station
item.description: Approaching New Mexico Weigh Station and Border Patrol Checkpoint.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 41
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 41 - Suisun Valley Road/Pittman Road. Approaching Weigh Station.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 1 - Redondo Center Drive/Giss Parkway. This is the first Arizona exit along I-8. Approaching the Arizona Port of Entry.
